name: excalidraw-dev-orchestrator
description: Run backend, frontend, and proxy together

scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend,proxy -c blue,magenta,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:proxy"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently -k -n backend,preview,proxy -c blue,magenta,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend-preview" "npm run start:proxy"
scripts.setup: npm --prefix backend install && (cd frontend && yarn install) && npm --prefix proxy install
